title: Apple macOS LaunchServices Sandbox Escape Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to escape the sandbox on affected installations of Apple macOS. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of XPC messages in the LaunchServices component. A crafted message can trigger execution of a privileged operation. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.
addtionnal_details: ZDI-CAN-15588 / CVE-2022-26696 was addressed in macOS Monterey 12.4.
timeline:
2021-12-22 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2022-08-15 - Coordinated public release of advisory
